planet.name: Kepler-595 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Morton et al. 2016. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Yoffe et al. 2020 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.name: Kepler-595 c
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Yoffe et al. 2020. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Yoffe et al. 2020 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
